channel.title: sillygwailo tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from sillygwailo.

item.description: @RM_Transit *Some* sports (like baseball), and large concerts, plus whatever else happens at SkyDome. I see what you’re saying, but the Raptors and Maple Leafs play right next door to Union Station. Plus a 10- to 15-minute walk isn’t that long.

I’m not even really sure I have a sensitively to loud noise (I like loud concerts), but I’d be all over a Blue Jays game that did this. I’d miss the flashing and strobing (I actually kind of like that), but I’d accept the lack of that if it also meant a quieter experience. https://t.co/hHv6gcMPDN

Nominations open for Toronto city council today. I have until August 19th to decide if I want to run. https://t.co/N96hyVmjCh
Whether or not I run for Toronto city council this election, I plan on donating to campaigns. Is there a list of candidates that have opted in to the Contribution Rebate Program? I’m very much more likely to donate (and donate more) if they do. https://t.co/IB6NZhQ298
Is there a Twitter List of people running for Toronto city council in 2022? I’d follow that in a heartbeat.

This afternoon. https://t.co/M6VYUQurI8
It was ultra-violent, but I got what I paid for, which is to say, Game of Thrones set in Iceland, and not just filmed there.

This morning. https://t.co/eNPec4d613
Race report, @torontomarathon 5k: It was windy, but at least the route was flat. #TorontoMarathon https://t.co/cu8oC0B9mZ
So far, 2022 is flying by. https://t.co/WgVZJzFdyg
